Property Documentation

virtual CmsFile Xenosynth.Web.UI.CmsDirectory.DefaultFile [get]
Initial value:
SELECT DISTINCT Value FROM CmsFileAttributes
WHERE Name = @Name
AND FileID IN (
 SELECT ID FROM CmsFiles
 WHERE State >= @State1 AND State < @State2
    AND FullPath LIKE @FullPath
)
ORDER BY Value
"
SELECT DISTINCT Value FROM CmsFileAttributes
WHERE Name = @Name
AND FileID IN (
 SELECT ID FROM CmsFiles
 WHERE State >= @State1 AND State < @State2
    AND ParentID = @ParentID
)
ORDER BY Value
"

Reimplemented in Xenosynth.Web.UI.CmsWebDirectory.
